Articles.Content:
Hi Squad

I just want to ast if it's possible to download the logos for the agencies as hi-resolution eps or AI file.

I worked a little bit with the PNG from the wiki (they are at least transparent).

Or is it not allowed to see them?

I played around a little bit for using them as fictional companies that sponsor my ride in iRacing (www.iracing.com). So this is what i got togehter in a few minutes to test the "look". I hope this is OK for you guys...

 

If it's ok and allowed I would love to do something cleaner that this. the iracing templates are hi-res and so should be the logos. and with path-based images i can do more on the quater pannels.

It its NOT ok i will stop this work.

Edited March 30, 2017 by KingPhantom

sorry. have to push this.

would be nice to read something to that small request

6 hours ago, KingPhantom said:

sorry. have to push this.

would be nice to read something to that small request

Perhaps taking a look at the EULA for KSP is in order here ...

https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/en/?page_id=39

I'm confused. Unless KingPhantom wants to make real money from iracing.com using KSP artwork, I'm not seeing how this violates the EULA. Or would this be a derivative work?

Who would be a good person to ask at Squad for permission to use the artwork? Maybe they could 'sponsor' King here with a no-charge limited use licence to use it? Or some such. Some cross-genre promotion would be neat to see.

this is non money making. no sponsoring. nothing to do with that. should not be a violation of the EULA

 

its just graphical

an additon to this: most of the time the skins are just on my machine. i do some league racing but there i only use logos where i have the permisson for it or i designed by myself. if i got the permission i would use them also online.

but this is just eyecandy!
